messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: @Jonathan Shih @lydia for training a classifier to split documents based on templates (like the FRB poc) is it better to have the training templates be blank templates or be filled in with data?
better for them to be blank templates. right now we assume they are blank templates, with one sample per template. for docsplitting, we treat each example as a separate template
this is different from the traditional classifier case, where we treat all files with X label as equal examples of X (e.g. luke's lobster receipts)
